00026 // C compatible matrix: row-oriented, 0-based [i][j] and 1-based (i,j) indexing
00027 //
00028 
00029 #ifndef CMAT_H
00030 #define CMAT_H
00031 
00032 #include "tnt/subscript.h"
00033 #include "tnt/vec.h"
00034 #include <cstdlib>
00035 #include <cassert>
00036 #include <iostream>
00037 #include <strstream>
00038 #ifdef TNT_USE_REGIONS
00039 #include "tnt/region2d.h"
00040 #endif

00042 namespace TNT
00043 {
00044 
00045 template <class T>
00046 class Matrix 
00047 {
00048 
00049   public:
00050     typedef Subscript   size_type;
00051     typedef         T   value_type;
00052     typedef         T   element_type;
00053     typedef         T*  pointer;
00054     typedef         T*  iterator;
00055     typedef         T&  reference;
00056     typedef const   T*  const_iterator;
00057     typedef const   T&  const_reference;
00058     Subscript lbound() const { return 1;}
00059   protected:
00060     Subscript m_;
00061     Subscript n_;
00062     Subscript mn_;      // total size
00063     T* v_;                  
00064     T** row_;           
00065     T* vm1_ ;       // these point to the same data, but are 1-based 
00066     T** rowm1_;
00067     // internal helper function to create the array
00068     // of row pointers
00069 
00070     void initialize(Subscript M, Subscript N)
00071     {
00072         mn_ = M*N;
00073         m_ = M;
00074         n_ = N;
00075 
00076         v_ = new T[mn_]; 
00077         row_ = new T*[M];
00078         rowm1_ = new T*[M];
00079 
00080         assert(v_  != NULL);
00081         assert(row_  != NULL);
00082         assert(rowm1_ != NULL);
00083 
00084         T* p = v_;              
00085         vm1_ = v_ - 1;
00086         for (Subscript i=0; i<M; i++)
00087         {
00088             row_[i] = p;
00089             rowm1_[i] = p-1;
00090             p += N ;
00091             
00092         }
00093 
00094         rowm1_ -- ;     // compensate for 1-based offset
00095     }
00096    
00097     void copy(const T*  v)
00098     {
00099         Subscript N = m_ * n_;
00100         Subscript i;
00101     #ifdef TNT_UNROLL_LOOPS
00102         Subscript Nmod4 = N & 3;
00103         Subscript N4 = N - Nmod4;
00104 
00105         for (i=0; i<N4; i+=4)
00106         {
00107             v_[i] = v[i];
00108             v_[i+1] = v[i+1];
00109             v_[i+2] = v[i+2];
00110             v_[i+3] = v[i+3];
00111         }
00112 
00113         for (i=N4; i< N; i++)
00114             v_[i] = v[i];
00115     #else
00116         for (i=0; i< N; i++)
00117             v_[i] = v[i];
00118     #endif      
00119 
00120     }
00121 
00122     void set(const T& val)
00123     {
00124         Subscript N = m_ * n_;
00125         Subscript i;
00126     #ifdef TNT_UNROLL_LOOPS
00127         Subscript Nmod4 = N & 3;
00128         Subscript N4 = N - Nmod4;
00129 
00130         for (i=0; i<N4; i+=4)
00131         {
00132             v_[i] = val;
00133             v_[i+1] = val;
00134             v_[i+2] = val;
00135             v_[i+3] = val; 
00136         }
00137         for (i=N4; i< N; i++)
00138             v_[i] = val;
00139     #else
00140         for (i=0; i< N; i++)
00141             v_[i] = val;          
00142     #endif      
00143     }
00144     
00145 
00146     
00147     void destroy()
00148     {     
00149         /* do nothing, if no memory has been previously allocated */
00150         if (v_ == NULL) return ;
00151 
00152         /* if we are here, then matrix was previously allocated */
00153         if (v_ != NULL) delete [] (v_);     
00154         if (row_ != NULL) delete [] (row_);
00155 
00156         /* return rowm1_ back to original value */
00157         rowm1_ ++;
00158         if (rowm1_ != NULL ) delete [] (rowm1_);
00159     }
00160 
00161 
00162   public:
00163 
00164     operator T**(){ return  row_; }
00165     operator T**() const { return row_; }
00166 
00167 
00168     Subscript size() const { return mn_; }
00169 
00170     // constructors
00171 
00172     Matrix() : m_(0), n_(0), mn_(0), v_(0), row_(0), vm1_(0), rowm1_(0) {};
00173 
00174     Matrix(const Matrix<T> &A)
00175     {
00176         initialize(A.m_, A.n_);
00177         copy(A.v_);
00178     }
00179 
00180     Matrix(Subscript M, Subscript N, const T& value = T())
00181     {
00182         initialize(M,N);
00183         set(value);
00184     }
00185 
00186     Matrix(Subscript M, Subscript N, const T* v)
00187     {
00188         initialize(M,N);
00189         copy(v);
00190     }
00191 
00192     Matrix(Subscript M, Subscript N, const char *s)
00193     {
00194         initialize(M,N);
00195         std::istrstream ins(s);
00196 
00197         Subscript i, j;
00198 
00199         for (i=0; i<M; i++)
00200             for (j=0; j<N; j++)
00201                 ins >> row_[i][j];
00202     }
00203 
00204     // destructor
00205     //
00206     ~Matrix()
00207     {
00208         destroy();
00209     }
00210 
00211 
00212     // reallocating
00213     //
00214     Matrix<T>& newsize(Subscript M, Subscript N)
00215     {
00216         if (num_rows() == M && num_cols() == N)
00217             return *this;
00218 
00219         destroy();
00220         initialize(M,N);
00221         
00222         return *this;
00223     }
00224 
00225 
00226 
00227 
00228     // assignments
00229     //
00230     Matrix<T>& operator=(const Matrix<T> &A)
00231     {
00232         if (v_ == A.v_)
00233             return *this;
00234 
00235         if (m_ == A.m_  && n_ == A.n_)      // no need to re-alloc
00236             copy(A.v_);
00237 
00238         else
00239         {
00240             destroy();
00241             initialize(A.m_, A.n_);
00242             copy(A.v_);
00243         }
00244 
00245         return *this;
00246     }
00247         
00248     Matrix<T>& operator=(const T& scalar)
00249     { 
00250         set(scalar); 
00251         return *this;
00252     }
00253 
00254 
00255     Subscript dim(Subscript d) const 
00256     {
00257 #ifdef TNT_BOUNDS_CHECK
00258        assert( d >= 1);
00259         assert( d <= 2);
00260 #endif
00261         return (d==1) ? m_ : ((d==2) ? n_ : 0); 
00262     }
00263 
00264     Subscript num_rows() const { return m_; }
00265     Subscript num_cols() const { return n_; }
00266 
00267 
00268 
00269 
00270     inline T* operator[](Subscript i)
00271     {
00272 #ifdef TNT_BOUNDS_CHECK
00273         assert(0<=i);
00274         assert(i < m_) ;
00275 #endif
00276         return row_[i];
00277     }
00278 
00279     inline const T* operator[](Subscript i) const
00280     {
00281 #ifdef TNT_BOUNDS_CHECK
00282         assert(0<=i);
00283         assert(i < m_) ;
00284 #endif
00285         return row_[i];
00286     }
00287 
00288     inline reference operator()(Subscript i)
00289     { 
00290 #ifdef TNT_BOUNDS_CHECK
00291         assert(1<=i);
00292         assert(i <= mn_) ;
00293 #endif
00294         return vm1_[i]; 
00295     }
00296 
00297     inline const_reference operator()(Subscript i) const
00298     { 
00299 #ifdef TNT_BOUNDS_CHECK
00300         assert(1<=i);
00301         assert(i <= mn_) ;
00302 #endif
00303         return vm1_[i]; 
00304     }
00305 
00306 
00307 
00308     inline reference operator()(Subscript i, Subscript j)
00309     { 
00310 #ifdef TNT_BOUNDS_CHECK
00311         assert(1<=i);
00312         assert(i <= m_) ;
00313         assert(1<=j);
00314         assert(j <= n_);
00315 #endif
00316         return  rowm1_[i][j]; 
00317     }
00318 
00319 
00320     
00321     inline const_reference operator() (Subscript i, Subscript j) const
00322     {
00323 #ifdef TNT_BOUNDS_CHECK
00324         assert(1<=i);
00325         assert(i <= m_) ;
00326         assert(1<=j);
00327         assert(j <= n_);
00328 #endif
00329         return rowm1_[i][j]; 
00330     }
00331 
00332 
00333 
00334 #ifdef TNT_USE_REGIONS
00335 
00336     typedef Region2D<Matrix<T> > Region;
00337     
00338 
00339     Region operator()(const Index1D &I, const Index1D &J)
00340     {
00341         return Region(*this, I,J);
00342     }
00343 
00344 
00345     typedef const_Region2D< Matrix<T> > const_Region;
00346     const_Region operator()(const Index1D &I, const Index1D &J) const
00347     {
00348         return const_Region(*this, I,J);
00349     }
00350 
00351 #endif
00352 
00353 
00354 };

00357 /* ***************************  I/O  ********************************/
00358 
00359 template <class T>
00360 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream &s, const Matrix<T> &A)
00361 {
00362     Subscript M=A.num_rows();
00363     Subscript N=A.num_cols();
00364 
00365     s << M << " " << N << "\n";
00366 
00367     for (Subscript i=0; i<M; i++)
00368     {
00369         for (Subscript j=0; j<N; j++)
00370         {
00371             s << A[i][j] << " ";
00372         }
00373         s << "\n";
00374     }
00375 
00376 
00377     return s;
00378 }
00379 
00380 template <class T>
00381 std::istream& operator>>(std::istream &s, Matrix<T> &A)
00382 {
00383 
00384     Subscript M, N;
00385 
00386     s >> M >> N;
00387 
00388     if ( !(M == A.num_rows() && N == A.num_cols() ))
00389     {
00390         A.newsize(M,N);
00391     }
00392 
00393 
00394     for (Subscript i=0; i<M; i++)
00395         for (Subscript j=0; j<N; j++)
00396         {
00397             s >>  A[i][j];
00398         }
00399 
00400 
00401     return s;
00402 }

00404 // *******************[ basic matrix algorithms ]***************************
00405 
00406 
00407 template <class T>
00408 Matrix<T> operator+(const Matrix<T> &A, 
00409     const Matrix<T> &B)
00410 {
00411     Subscript M = A.num_rows();
00412     Subscript N = A.num_cols();
00413 
00414     assert(M==B.num_rows());
00415     assert(N==B.num_cols());
00416 
00417     Matrix<T> tmp(M,N);
00418     Subscript i,j;
00419 
00420     for (i=0; i<M; i++)
00421         for (j=0; j<N; j++)
00422             tmp[i][j] = A[i][j] + B[i][j];
00423 
00424     return tmp;
00425 }
00426 
00427 template <class T>
00428 Matrix<T> operator-(const Matrix<T> &A, 
00429     const Matrix<T> &B)
00430 {
00431     Subscript M = A.num_rows();
00432     Subscript N = A.num_cols();
00433 
00434     assert(M==B.num_rows());
00435     assert(N==B.num_cols());
00436 
00437     Matrix<T> tmp(M,N);
00438     Subscript i,j;
00439 
00440     for (i=0; i<M; i++)
00441         for (j=0; j<N; j++)
00442             tmp[i][j] = A[i][j] - B[i][j];
00443 
00444     return tmp;
00445 }
00446 
00447 template <class T>
00448 Matrix<T> mult_element(const Matrix<T> &A, 
00449     const Matrix<T> &B)
00450 {
00451     Subscript M = A.num_rows();
00452     Subscript N = A.num_cols();
00453 
00454     assert(M==B.num_rows());
00455     assert(N==B.num_cols());
00456 
00457     Matrix<T> tmp(M,N);
00458     Subscript i,j;
00459 
00460     for (i=0; i<M; i++)
00461         for (j=0; j<N; j++)
00462             tmp[i][j] = A[i][j] * B[i][j];
00463 
00464     return tmp;
00465 }
00466 
00467 
00468 template <class T>
00469 Matrix<T> transpose(const Matrix<T> &A)
00470 {
00471     Subscript M = A.num_rows();
00472     Subscript N = A.num_cols();
00473 
00474     Matrix<T> S(N,M);
00475     Subscript i, j;
00476 
00477     for (i=0; i<M; i++)
00478         for (j=0; j<N; j++)
00479             S[j][i] = A[i][j];
00480 
00481     return S;
00482 }
00483 
00484 
00485     
00486 template <class T>
00487 inline Matrix<T> matmult(const Matrix<T>  &A, 
00488     const Matrix<T> &B)
00489 {
00490 
00491 #ifdef TNT_BOUNDS_CHECK
00492     assert(A.num_cols() == B.num_rows());
00493 #endif
00494 
00495     Subscript M = A.num_rows();
00496     Subscript N = A.num_cols();
00497     Subscript K = B.num_cols();
00498 
00499     Matrix<T> tmp(M,K);
00500     T sum;
00501 
00502     for (Subscript i=0; i<M; i++)
00503     for (Subscript k=0; k<K; k++)
00504     {
00505         sum = 0;
00506         for (Subscript j=0; j<N; j++)
00507             sum = sum +  A[i][j] * B[j][k];
00508 
00509         tmp[i][k] = sum; 
00510     }
00511 
00512     return tmp;
00513 }
00514 
00515 template <class T>
00516 inline Matrix<T> operator*(const Matrix<T>  &A, 
00517     const Matrix<T> &B)
00518 {
00519     return matmult(A,B);
00520 }
00521 
00522 template <class T>
00523 inline int matmult(Matrix<T>& C, const Matrix<T>  &A, 
00524     const Matrix<T> &B)
00525 {
00526 
00527     assert(A.num_cols() == B.num_rows());
00528 
00529     Subscript M = A.num_rows();
00530     Subscript N = A.num_cols();
00531     Subscript K = B.num_cols();
00532 
00533     C.newsize(M,K);
00534 
00535     T sum;
00536 
00537     const T* row_i;
00538     const T* col_k;
00539 
00540     for (Subscript i=0; i<M; i++)
00541     for (Subscript k=0; k<K; k++)
00542     {
00543         row_i  = &(A[i][0]);
00544         col_k  = &(B[0][k]);
00545         sum = 0;
00546         for (Subscript j=0; j<N; j++)
00547         {
00548             sum  += *row_i * *col_k;
00549             row_i++;
00550             col_k += K;
00551         }
00552         C[i][k] = sum; 
00553     }
00554 
00555     return 0;
00556 }
00557 
00558 
00559 template <class T>
00560 Vector<T> matmult(const Matrix<T>  &A, const Vector<T> &x)
00561 {
00562 
00563 #ifdef TNT_BOUNDS_CHECK
00564     assert(A.num_cols() == x.dim());
00565 #endif
00566 
00567     Subscript M = A.num_rows();
00568     Subscript N = A.num_cols();
00569 
00570     Vector<T> tmp(M);
00571     T sum;
00572 
00573     for (Subscript i=0; i<M; i++)
00574     {
00575         sum = 0;
00576         const T* rowi = A[i];
00577         for (Subscript j=0; j<N; j++)
00578             sum = sum +  rowi[j] * x[j];
00579 
00580         tmp[i] = sum; 
00581     }
00582 
00583     return tmp;
00584 }
00585 
00586 template <class T>
00587 inline Vector<T> operator*(const Matrix<T>  &A, const Vector<T> &x)
00588 {
00589     return matmult(A,x);
00590 }
